sub-events.comment: Bullet Hits Bullet
Tank Crushing and Bullet hit behavior for Bushes. If hitcount less than 2 it adds. greater or equal to 2... destroy bush.
Tank Crushing and Bullet hit behavior for Trees. If hitcount less than 5 it adds. greater or equal to 5... destroy tree.
Bullet hits on lazer shocks and what happens if tank tries to cross it without destroying it
Bullet hit behavior for StoneWalls. Hitcount less than 15 it adds. greater or equal to 15... fuck no you cant destroy a stonewall.

Bullet hit behavior for Spikes. Spikes retract on getting hit
